title: Venus in Leo
summary: Affection wants to be seen and celebrated. Generosity, play, and creative flair color relationships. The opportunity is to share warmth boldly while keeping humility and reciprocity in view.

meaning.headline: Connection is expressive, proud, and eager to brighten the room.

frames.text: Venus in Leo highlights grand gestures, loyalty, and the joy of being admired.
Creativity and playfulness become avenues for affection.
Confidence in love grows when appreciation is mutual.
Dramatic flair is fun when grounded in sincerity.
Attention guarantees devotion or gives license to overpromise.

frictions: Taking feedback as criticism of worth
opportunities: Being generous with time or resources

do: Give praise that is specific and real.
Invite others into the spotlight with you.
Use play to diffuse minor tension.
avoid: Ignoring practical details while chasing fun
Making promises in the heat of excitement

reusable_lines.text: Let your warmth shine, and let others shine too.
Bold affection works best when it’s grounded in truth.

forbidden_claims: Promises of popularity or romantic success
allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can boost generosity and self-expression
Agency-forward language: you choose how to give and receive attention
Contextual framing: playfulness helps when paired with sincerity

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
